GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v6.0.18
GSD.description:
dm thin: Fix ABBA deadlock between shrink_slab and dm_pool_abort_metadata

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit 2d891cc5a1706b6908bceb56af7176a463ee6d62, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit e49e582965b3694f07a106adc83ddb44aa4f0890. For more details please see the references link.
